Traditional Web Development

This page represents traditional HTML content without the modern component-based structure.

About Traditional Development

Traditional web development relied on monolithic HTML pages with embedded styling and scripting. While effective, this approach can become difficult to maintain as sites grow larger and more complex.

Content Management

Content management in traditional systems often required direct HTML editing, making it challenging for non-technical users to update content regularly.
